skill.name: Smile World
skill.description: Add 1 "Smile World" to your hand from outside of your Deck. If you activate this Skill, you can only activate or use the effect of "Smile" Spell/Trap cards until the end of your opponent's next turn. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.

linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Yuya Sakaki
linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Yuya Sakaki. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm him as efficiently as possible.

children.content: keys to duel at the gate.
You will see Yuya 's unlock missions upon reaching Stage 9 or above in Duel World (DM)
Unlocking Yuya will also unlock Duel World (ARC-V)
Summon 1 Level (Rank) 7 or higher Dragon-Type monster(s).

skill.name: The Tie that Binds
skill.description: Until the end of your turn, the ATK of all face-up monsters on your field increases by the number of monsters on your field times 100. This Skill can only be used once per turn.

linkedArticle.description: Everything you need to know about farming Jaden/Yubel. His decklists, card rewards, top level farm decks with strategy information and free to play card replacements. This article will help you farm them as efficiently as possible.
linkedArticle.title: How to Farm Jaden/Yubel

children.content: keys to duel at the gate.
Jaden/Yubel appears at the gate at Stage 10 (GX)
Successfuly perform 1 Fusion Summon(s) in Duels against
Recover 3000 or more LP in one Duel against
Use a Spell Card 5 time(s) in one Duel against
1 time(s) while playing as Yubel, in a Duel against
